description: A large alligator, inexplicably armed with a plunger, bursts through a doorway, seemingly emerging from a flooded plumbing system. A woman in an orange polka-dot dress frantically struggles with the creature, attempting to fend it off. Nearby, a man seated in a chair calmly reads a newspaper, largely indifferent to the chaotic scene unfolding beside him. The absurd situation portrays a common urban infrastructure problem escalating into a surreal and dangerous, yet mundane, inconvenience for one of the occupants. Water spills from the doorway, emphasizing the 'backup' described in the caption.
caption: "Curse this New York City sewer system! ...It's backing up again."
